document.full_text: arab leaders were wrong to block internet access in an effort to quell popular revolts as such moves only hurt their own economies, google chairman eric schmidt said on thursday.
document.title: arab web clampdown hurts own economies: google's schmidt
lines_and_colors: arab leaders were wrong to block internet access in an effort to quell popular revolts as such moves only hurt their own economies, google chairman eric schmidt said on thursday.
